value.name: Calls for Invercargill Mayor Sir Tim Shadbolt to explain licence
value.description: All of the people questioned were residents of Invercargill city. Student Jacob Craig, 18, said since the information had come out about Sir Tim, the mayor should give the community an explanation.

value.name: Spirited competition: Big Blue Cocktail Contest comes to South Lake Tahoe
value.description: The drink is fruity and refreshing, perfect for any party. Big Girls Don’t Chai Bartender Jacob Craig over at Cold Water Brewery has combined Tahoe Blue Vodka with cinnamon bitters, orange zest ...
